DOC.brief_summary: To assess impact embryo biopsy reproductive potential human embryo .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Impact Embryo Biopsy Reproductive Potential Embryos Undergoing In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF )
DOC.detailed_description: This study recruit patient NY/NJ/CT/eastern PA area . All patient undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) cycle hormonal stimulation egg retrieval procedure deem appropriate diagnosis . Following biopsy , embryos transfer . There delay time transfer cell analyze prior transfer . On day 3 day 5 embryo development , patient undergo two ( 2 ) embryo transfer . The embryo select transfer 2 morphologically best embryo cohort . Once select transfer , embryos randomize one biopsied transfer without undergo biopsy . The embryo randomize biopsy single cell biopsied . Following delivery , buccal swab collect infant .
DOC.criteria: This study recruit patient NY/NJ/CT/eastern PA area . 1 . Maximum one prior fail IVF treatment cycle 2 . Female partner le 35 year age 3 . Normal day 3 FSH level ( < 10 miu/mL ) 4 . Total basal antral follicle count great equal 12 5 . Male partner great 100,000 total motile spermatozoon least 1 % normal form 6 . Body mass index ( BMI ) < = 32 7 . Normal uterine cavity 1 . Diagnosis chronic anovulation secondary polycystic ovarian disease 2 . Diagnosis endometrial insufficiency 3 . Clinical indication preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) ( undergo IVF PGD rule know genetic defect ) 4 . Use testicular aspiration biopsy procedure obtain sperm
